website_summaries.verdict: Iron Man’s Hulkbuster armor is bigger, shinier, and with its hefty bobblehead, it has more personality than any other Funko Pop! Avengers toy.
pros: Super-sized Hulkbuster stands nearly twice as tall as the average Pop!
cons: It’s a bit pricier than the average Funko Pop!

customer_reviews.title: Oh god help me...
customer_reviews.text: It is so amazing that I dont even know what to write about it. It is large. Sturdy, Amazing. Really. Check pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A K.

customer_reviews.title: Do not order with heavy objects.
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged due to a second order that was in the box. The Funko Pop was smashed due to the second items’ weight and movement. This was part of a collection.
customer_reviews.author: john eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, and big!
customer_reviews.text: As all Funko Pop figures I have, and this is no exception, they cost a little more than you'd think but are well worth it. This is one of the biggest I have, and I was happily surprised it is also a bobble head, so when my friends come to my house they always laugh at this big hulkbuster shaking its head haha I definitely recommend if you think you might like it. You definitely will!
customer_reviews.author: mettrau

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!
customer_reviews.text: You have been warned: Sadly this is the fourth Funko pop I got that the bobblehead comes messed up. The head was twisted too much to the right side. You won't notice this unless you take it out of the box. I'm one of those guys that likes to take the pop out of the box Also it had these white/gray-ish smudges all over the beautiful red paint. I was extremely disappointed when taking out this beautiful 6 inch pop.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son is going to freak he has been looking for this one for months he’s only 5yr but obsessed with these super hero funko pops . Another one to add to his collection it’s pretty big I can’t wait to see his face when I finally give it to him. Amazon sent me a notification that it came back in stock for a resonable price $15 and I jumped on it. It’s alreasy out of stock I see . I don’t know how am I going to convince him to leave it in the box!! I don’t think that’s gonna happen.
customer_reviews.author: bettyboop009

customer_reviews.title: It’s him!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to get this version of Hulkbuster. There is a cut on top of the box, so to those who are wanting mint boxes you MAY want to not buy it off of here. It doesn’t bother me but I know there are box collectors out there.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna V.

customer_reviews.title: Near Mint
customer_reviews.text: I was one of few who got a near mint box. It's not 100% mint, but near mint. I didn't have a huge gash on top like others mentioned, luckily. I love it, my first six inch pop and I know this will rise in price eventually. It's a must buy if you're a marvel funko collector, the design is a lot better than the original hulk buster.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Much Better in Person
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how good this would look from the product photos. It seemed to have a "cheaper" style and paint job compared to the previous Hulk Buster version (from Age of Ultron), but once I received it, I could tell that the pictures just don't do it justice. This is a great looking product and I'm glad I bought it to go next to my Age of Ultron one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Head popped off within 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this ahead of time as a gift for my son’s 14th Birthday (so can’t return it). Very nice looking, but..... the head fell off after 2 days. My husband was able to glue it back on but I am not happy with the quality of this product. I could not recommend this as an actual toy to play with. Seems more suited just to put on shelf and look at. Not sure why it would be a bobble head if you can’t bobble it without breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites now.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first 6"POP, looks amazing. Definitely has some weight to it. Shipping was fast, product looks great, and box is ..great. Just one minor dent. Something I can look past. Over all great piece to the collection. I regret nothing. P.S. That's the plastic sleeve that looks a bit scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Alex review said it best, Wow!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT DEAL - AWESOME FUNKO Not enough space to write great things. Here is my negative feedback; ________ (blank). Awesome character, great pose and detail. Goes with our color scheme also! Delivery driver was super nice, made my day!
customer_reviews.author: frequentuser20

customer_reviews.title: Okay but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The quality isn't the greatest on the one I received, painting seems a little off. For the cost it's good but still could use some work. Luckily it stands up straight unlike the brumak. He makes a decent addition to the seemingly growing collection of things I don't need.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super cool Hulkbuster!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! My 7 year old is obsessed with Hulkbuster and he can’t NOT play with this! It was the best gift ever! Great condition, very sturdy, box was in great shape but couldn’t tell my son not to play with it haha
customer_reviews.author: Mis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Looking Pop.
customer_reviews.text: I will admit, when I read reviews, the box issues were concerning me [most amazon pops box orders have came pretty damaged]. But I'm happy to say I actually got a nice great box looks mint. No issues. My 1st 6" figure and wow it has amazing detail for a Pop figure.
customer_reviews.author: RLS_323

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This Funko Pop has got to be the sturdiest, heaviest one they make. The detail is amazing, and the weight of this thing is unexpected. It looks amazing on display!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great Funko Pop
customer_reviews.text: A well made funko pop. You will love this if you are a funko collector. It looks great with my other pops. Unfortunately the one I bought came very damaged (the arm fell off when I opened it) but overall it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy Andy

customer_reviews.title: Son adores it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known it was a bobble head but my 1 year old loves it, my daughter accidentally broke the head but I was able to JB Weld it back on and he has been playing with it ever since and is among his favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Plague

customer_reviews.title: Hulk Buster is Hulk Size
customer_reviews.text: I expected the Hulk Buster to be of normal pop funko size. No, this thing is massive lol. I’m not mad about it though. It’s a great piece to the collection! Also, everything including the box came in mint condition. The bobble works perfect as well.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical but loved it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy this because of the reviews about the legs breaking off but it arrived in great condition. The box was great and the pop itself is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: My kid wanted this for his collection. Havent ordered much Funko Pops off Amazon. But this was not damaged at all. Great shape. Nice addition to his collection
customer_reviews.author: Ron Stalnaker

customer_reviews.title: It looks like Amazon didn't put much packing material in the box ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine also came with a cut on top and the plastic window was no longer glued. It looks like Amazon didn't put much packing material in the box so he shifted around more in transit than expected. If you are hoping for a perfect box, you may not want to order from here but he is a heavy and good looking collectible beyond the box.
customer_reviews.author: CJL

customer_reviews.title: Funko: Iron Man pop figure.
customer_reviews.text: I said Funko: Iron Man pop figure, because this is more like a figure of and not the first on which was somewhat bulkier. I really like this rendition of Tony Stark or my favorite the "Hulk", which ever decides to be wearing the armor.
customer_reviews.author: LINEWALKER

customer_reviews.title: So Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is everything I've wanted in a Hulkbuster bobblehead. It's heavy, durable, and the amount of detail is impressive. I wish all of them were this big and intricately detailed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for any Avengers or Ironman fan! It will look great inside or outside of the box. Great detail and pretty heavy! The price is right so no reason not to add to your collection!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: What what it said it was
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it said it was, minor damage to the package, otherwise it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: stephen dillehayes

customer_reviews.title: It's Still A Bobble Head
customer_reviews.text: I thought this looked cool, but did not realize it is a bobble head. I thought it was hilarious that it has such a small head and is still a bobble head. Honestly it looks awesome
customer_reviews.author: Chad Wilt

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Heavy pop
customer_reviews.text: This pop had been at the top of my list for a while. Glad I found one and at a great price. Item arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Guido Insigne

customer_reviews.title: Great for under $10.
customer_reviews.text: For MSRP, this is ridiculously expensive. The paint quality and materials just don't justify the price. But if you're into Funko and get a deal on this, it's a nice addition to a Funko collection.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kleinberg

customer_reviews.title: My kid loved it
customer_reviews.text: this is actually a gift my kid asked for and he loved it, actually the figure is very sturdy and solid, I did not think it was good quality, but when I saw it, I realized it is very good quality and really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: gerardoahuatzin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! one of the best Funkos I bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one in a Black Friday sale but, despite the great price, the quality of this big Funko is great! sturdy, heavy and robust. They did a really good job with this Hulkbuster!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pop! Super heavy and paint job is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pop! Super heavy and paint job is amazing! My box came in great condition although didn’t have much packing material. Definitely a must have for Marvel pop collectors.
customer_reviews.author: manuel ramirez

customer_reviews.title: This is very heavy and not really meant to play with as an action figure.
customer_reviews.text: The head is sort of a bobble head, it's on a spring and turned to the side, and the toy is very heavy, I feel like with a little rough play someone is bound to get injured.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Brown

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love Funko Pop in general. This one is particularly awesome. It’s nice and solid. Yes, the head bobs, which is hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrannosaurus Bex

customer_reviews.title: Head popped off on day 2
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty good looking toy, meaning it does not look like a cheap build. The thing that annoyed me was that the head popped off on day 2. It's (kind of) a bobble head and the glue holding the plastic spring hook and the head came off.
customer_reviews.author: Vreddy

customer_reviews.title: Try to handle boxes better
customer_reviews.text: First, three stars because the box came damaged and I’m very anal about the box when it comes to my pops. The front was in tact and looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: Great product for iron man lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product totally worth it the only thing was the head is not placed directly in the middle it's as If hes looking to the right and up a bit but it is fixable with a little twist
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and I absolutely love it, it looks excellent with the rest of my Marvel Funko. My only issue with it is the figure arrived covered in some sort of chalky film. It was easy to wipe off, but a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Got this for 8 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale, worth the 8 bucks or so. Slickdeals offers are hard to pass on such a deal. This thing was massive for a Pop Figure!
customer_reviews.author: qiaoAMZfinds

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is one awesome Pop ! If you love Infinity Wars this Pop is a must!! Arrived perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: Pop goes the Wallet

customer_reviews.title: Really worth it
customer_reviews.text: He is huge but not as huge as a 10 inch but still as awesome and detailed
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Just a few details for collectors.
customer_reviews.text: This Pop looks awesome. It doesn’t have the same eyes as come standard on almost all Pops and the box is deeper than the first version of the Hulkbuster, which is interesting if you display your Pops because when you face the box forward the Pop itself faces out at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great, awsome pop!!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery came in time. The pop looks amazing (besides the little paint problem in the arm). Even the box came without any damage. I ordered 2 pops and the packing was awesome. As I hope so, the pop is bigger than the other pops. And that's it, look at the pictures yourself. This is a great figure for everyone and every collection.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Boyar

customer_reviews.title: AWESOM FIGURE AND 3X'S BIGGER THAN 1 EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: ITS HEAVY & BUILT TO KILL, ONE OF THE BEST MADE & WILL BLOW YOUR DOORS OFF WHEN YOU GET IT !!
customer_reviews.author: MN. FATTS

customer_reviews.title: Great product great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Son has been looking for this Hulkbuster for a while, Good value!!!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Iron Man!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got to love it and got it for a great price, thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: You will like this figure.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and large Pop figure. His head does bobble a little. There is a nice heft/weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's huge and surprisingly heavy. Probably the most well made pop i've seen. Looks great on my sons desk, gonna have to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Trueoner

customer_reviews.title: No movement
customer_reviews.text: Heads weak and broke off, theres basically no movement and its just a hard heavy piece of plastic with a bit of a wobbable head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Head pops off!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a birthday gift for my son and that same day the head popped off. We were given a replacement which was great but the head just popped off again so I have a crying 4 year old so upset that his toy is broken again :(
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McVey

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge, detailed, geekdom happy in this house! Cheap price at the time of ordering so it was more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Geekfamily2008

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Damaged box. Unacceptable. These are collectibles and not handled with care.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Carlini

customer_reviews.title: Meh durability
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is heavy but the head & chest plate pop off super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good quality and as a collector that is what is most important to me. Would by from this suppler again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great collectible
customer_reviews.text: Great collectible. Bought for my son for his birthday he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Sutphin

customer_reviews.title: The head was at a stupid angle out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to slowly change the position of the spring
customer_reviews.author: C. Myers

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks and little bobble head! It's so sturdy and is definitely one of my favorite funkos
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: The product contains the items described. It arrived in perfect condition and without any problem
customer_reviews.author: ANDRES FELIPE GONZALEZ BOTERO

customer_reviews.title: Totally cool
customer_reviews.text: This guy is awesome. He’s got great weight to him and is a fantastic addition to our iron man collection.
customer_reviews.author: Tony & Pep

customer_reviews.title: Very solid Funko Pop Figure
customer_reviews.text: For $15, it's double size than other funko pop. It's pretty cool to put it out at the table. All my co-worker asked me about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome funko pop
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 12 year old who loves the Avengers and Loves Marvel, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 6 inch POP
customer_reviews.text: I was so pumped when this arrived. The box is mint and the POP itself is amazing! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: amazing funko pop
customer_reviews.text: I like the hulkbuster from Avengers: Age of Ultron so this was a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Vega

customer_reviews.title: Price good, box damaged
customer_reviews.text: Loved the price, got a great deal. But, the box was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: Looked cool but the legs broke off in 5 days. Brittle and not well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: FY

customer_reviews.title: Really nice if it's for a collection but to play with ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice if it's for a collection but to play with not so good both shoulders fell off an hour after playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: gee ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Super Hulkbuster
customer_reviews.text: This Pop! is awesome. Very sturdy and looks great as part of my collection!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, looks great, prefect amount of wiggle. Great Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Legendarycheez

customer_reviews.title: Iron Man supreme
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Just how cool can Iron Man get? Uber-cool if you Hulkify his armor. Bigger than I expected, which is a good thing. Awesome display piece.
customer_reviews.author: KenMan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and it’s a good weight. Very nice compared to other Pops!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Figure
customer_reviews.text: A very large figure with nice color and weight to it... excellent - very happy with the purchase. I did not receive it damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Berti

customer_reviews.text: Looks just as pictured. I dont know if i didnt read it right but i thought this was going to be nore of an action figure but its a bobble head
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Figure looks good, but the box had puncture marks on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Figure looks good (looks like it has some gunk on it, but I managed to wipe it away with a rag). The box had puncture marks on the bottom. Not good for those of us that like to display in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Cool collectible
customer_reviews.text: I saw this funko and I knew it would be cool to have, when i open the box was even much more than expected
customer_reviews.author: Marco Avalos

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson's loves these
customer_reviews.text: Good price for this item and my grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lea Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice build and color. A bit heavy. Great to display.
customer_reviews.author: Sabernus Prime

customer_reviews.title: A great idea for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great gift to give and was well received. He did it and then hung it on his wall after he modge podged it. His daughters loved the posters that came with it. They are on their wall. Fun for all!
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love this figure but if course came damaged and i dont see how if it was bubble wrapped and there were 2 slits on top and bottom probly from a box cuter
customer_reviews.author: Mandy marie

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then i thought very hefty cant wait for my man to unwrapp it
customer_reviews.author: House Woods

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any collector
customer_reviews.text: Perfect box condition, rare and got for a good price
customer_reviews.author: David Brauer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this twice hoping that it wouldn't come damaged but both times it had box cutter marks and looks used. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bdig

customer_reviews.title: I did have to wait a while for my order ...
customer_reviews.text: I did have to wait a while for my order but I did get it and now my FIRST complete set is here! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Alan T Gilmer

customer_reviews.title: Hulkbuster Pop
customer_reviews.text: What to say? It's a Hulkbuster Pop! Doesn't get much cooler than this guy!
customer_reviews.author: L. Burgos

customer_reviews.title: The Hulk is his favorite
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves anything that has to do with the Hulk. He loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Packaging Great POP!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of my favorite Pop! It is a nice size and it has some weight to it .
customer_reviews.author: Emcee

customer_reviews.title: Bad copy, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, bad paiting, too many details between this one and the original, don’t buy this if you want to get the original one.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Zuñiga

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the collection.
customer_reviews.text: Wowed and amazed my brother who loves anything Iron Man makes! Very heavy and big.
customer_reviews.author: district12girl

customer_reviews.title: Would of been perfect if not for that
customer_reviews.text: Box came in with a box cutter scratch on the top of it. Would of been perfect if not for that.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie L.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box with unknown substance on the outside
customer_reviews.text: Box seemed to already be open. And the outside of the box had some kind of grease on it soaked through. Disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: BUNTHOEUN CHIM

customer_reviews.title: I got an "OK" item.
customer_reviews.text: Subpar condition. There were a couple of chips along the body and the paint job is not that great
customer_reviews.author: Mau

customer_reviews.title: Funko are fun high quality items that are great for people of all ages
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition in the original case very nice size truly something that a collector of Marvel items should get
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool & awesome for a collection
customer_reviews.text: Very satifisfied with my Hulkbuster. It is sitting with the rest of the Avengers!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Soracco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice packaging great and just need to more to complete collection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it but
customer_reviews.text: Product came with one side damaged I love it but why is it damaged
customer_reviews.author: Sara White

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Pops that I have in my collection
customer_reviews.text: Huge Funko Pop! One of the best Pops that I have in my collection. It is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Luis M.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged. Box in mint condition. Figure looks great. No extra labels on original box either. Perfect collectors condition.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: I really liked
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect . It’s amazing. The best Funko that I have. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Funko that disappointed me.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Funko Pop I don’t like. It looks more like an action figure than a Funko Pop. I was hoping he’d be more similar to the other 6’’ funkos like Goro and Giant man. Considering returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great add to Funko collection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to gift to someone and it arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anniemal

customer_reviews.title: Mint and good price
customer_reviews.text: Well this hulk buster came in super mint , the price was really good and the packaging was great . They put in bubble wrap which is great if your a collector and want to box to look great , I recommend buying this because of the price
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice 6" Funko. Bigger than most others and very heavy. Great add to our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Riddick

product_meta.title: Funko Pop! Marvel: Avengers Infinity War 6" Hulk buster Figure, Multicolor
product_meta.description: Size:6 InchesFrom Avengers Infinity War, Hulk buster 6", as a stylized POP vinyl from Funko! Figure stands 6 inches and comes in a window display box. Check out the other Avengers Infinity War figures from Funko! Collect them all!
feature_bullets: From Avengers Infinity War, Hulk Buster 6", as a stylized pop vinyl from Funko!
Stylized collectable stands 6 inches tall, perfect for any Avengers Infinity War fan!
Collect and display all Avengers Infinity War pop! Vinyl's!
Funko pop! is the 2017 toy of the year and people's choice award winner

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,610 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
